story: The trees were falling and a twilight came. Spontaneously, Ajax came to life and then spoke: 'Seaborgium is a synthetic element with symbol Sg and atomic number 106. Its most stable isotope 271Sg has a half-life of 1.9 minutes. A more recently discovered isotope 269Sg has a potentially slightly longer half-life (ca.' Then, Ajax agreed to enter the state of peaceful contemplation.
